body.name: DUMOS Armless Home Office Chair Ergonomic Desk with Comfy Low Back Lumbar Support, Height Adjustable PU Leather Computer Task with 360° Swivel Wheels, for Small Space, Kids and Adults, Beige White

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: PREMIUM MATERIALS - This small office chair without armrest is constructed by top-notch materials to guarantee maximum comfort and longevity. Its features a high-density, thickened sponge cushion (2.5 inches), that provides exceptional comfort and resilience. The chair is upholstered with high-quality PU leather, ensuring both waterproof protection and breathability through its twill design.

SPACE SAVING DESIGN - This small armless office chair is designed with space saving features in mind. The height-adjustable dimensions (24.21"(L) x 16.33"(W) x 34.25"(H)) ensure that it will fit perfectly into any office or workspace. Additionally, the armless design makes it easy to store it under your desk when not in use, maximizing the available space in your office area.

ENHANCED ERGONOMICS - This armless office chair is ergonomical designed for optimal comfort and support. The backrest is specially designed with padded foam to provide excellent lumbar support that is not only comfortable but also soft to the touch. Its backrest is made of high-quality U-shaped metal material, ensuring greater stability and durability.

STURDY AND DURABLE - The 360° swivel task chair is built to withstand long hours of use, featuring a high quality metal base and upgraded SGS-certified cylinders for durability and reliability. This computer desk chair has been rigorously tested over 10,000 times and is BIFMA certified. With a maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds, this chair is solid and reliable to ensure maximum comfort and safety.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE - All the necessary accessories are included in the package, ensuring a seamless assembly experience. Simply follow the easy-to-understand instructions consisting of just 6 steps, and installation manuals and videos are available for your reference. With an estimated installation time of just 10 minutes, you can enjoy the convenience of a fully assembled chair.

Can you provide the lowest height from the floor to the top of the cushion for this chair? Certainly! The lowest position of this height-adjustable office chair measures at a comfortable height of 17.71 inches from the floor to the top of the cushion, making it suitable for various desk types. What is the weight capacity of this chair? Rest assured, this small office chair has a robust maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds. Crafted with high-quality metal and certified by BIFMA, it ensures both durability and safety. What is the seat depth of this home office chair? The seat depth of this small-size home office computer desk chair is set at 17.51 inches. It provides sufficient space and support for the average user. Is assembly easy for this office chair? Absolutely! The installation process for this office chair is straightforward and hassle-free. With just 6 simple steps outlined in the provided installation manual or video, you can have the chair fully assembled in under 10 minutes. Is the cushion of the chair firm or soft? The cushion of this armless office chair strikes a perfect balance between firmness and softness. It is crafted with high-quality sponge cushion that offers optimal resilience, ensuring both comfort and support in your seating experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot of pieces, but easy to build
reviews.reviewText: The low price seems to be due to most of the construction being done by the consumer. The instructions are clear and the parts labeled, so it’s a pretty quick build. All the parts seem to be extremely sturdy. Once built, it’s a very comfortable chair. Great for shorter people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most adorable little office chair!
reviews.reviewText: Our house is really small. I was looking for the perfect little office chair that didn’t take up a lot of space and had a minimalistic, simple look. This one is just what I was looking for! The quality is really nice, putting it together was actually really fun and easy. The directions were straight forward and easy to follow. I even saw an instructional video on here but, I forgot to put it on when the time came. It comes with everything you need, it even includes the tools! I put it together myself in about 10 minutes. I’m in love with the outcome! It matches perfectly with my little table/desk. It rolls around very smoothly and easily. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Comfortable and Well Constructed
reviews.reviewText: This is without a doubt the most durable and comfortable computer chair that I have ever purchased. It was easy to assemble and all the necessary hardware and tools were provided. I was particularly impressed with the high quality of the components. The seat and back rest are very thickly padded, covered in quality leather, and very well made. Even the bolts were coated with thread locking compound so that they won't work themselves loose over time. The price was far less than you would expect for a chair of this quality and the chair was available with free shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfortable and Fluid!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. The seating is very comfortable with great back support. For YEARS I had been using my dining room chair and I should have invested in a good office chair a long time ago, but I just wasn’t in a good physical space to do so. With the dining room chair I needed a back support cushion and a butt cushion. Now, I don’t need either! The chair is so easy to assemble a toddler could do it, and it was done in less than an hour! I’m giving it four stars cause I ordered the white chair and the picture displays as white but what I received is definitely khaki colored. If I would have known that I would have gotten black. So the manufacturer needs to change that from white to khaki. Other than that, this chair is wonderful, and I do hope it lastsn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy chair!
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to my sewing room! I love being able to roll to my other machines without having to get up and physically lift the chair over! lol I love that it’s height is adjustable too - my machines are all on different tables so that was a must!Assembly was very easy! All the screws and tools were provided which was nice! I had it together in about 15 minutes.Only complaint about it was the wheels, nothing wrong with them, just kind of subpar wheels. I have textured wood tile, so that’s probably why they didn’t roll super smoothly. But no worries! I replaced the wheels with another “roller blade” style and it’s perfect!I love the modern style and color too! I may have to get another for my computer desk! lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievable quality for a low price!
reviews.reviewText: I just got this yesterday - this office chair is perfect for me! Easy to assemble, extremely comfortable & supportive for my lower back plus since it takes up less room than my last chair, I was able to acquire more space in my study.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: This was very simple to put together. Directions were clear and screws etc were separated based on where they go. It is surprisingly sturdy. For an occasional task chair that easily slides away under a desk it's perfect and exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice chair
reviews.reviewText: Chair is very comfortableEasy to put togetherQuality seems niceSit on it for 6 to 8 hours with no problems
